titleStmt.title: The philosophie, commonlie called, the morals vvritten by the learned philosopher Plutarch of Chæronea. Translated out of Greeke into English, and conferred with the Latine translations and the French, by Philemon Holland of Coventrie, Doctor in Physicke. VVhereunto are annexed the summaries necessary to be read before every treatise
Moralia. English
titleStmt.author: Plutarch.
Holland, Philemon, 1552-1637.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
